channel.title: Blue Sea on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Blue Sea on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Kovalam and Varkala beach
item.description: Drive from Kanyankumari was smooth, Aarush took a small nap. The road was undivided two lanes so the speed was limited but the lush green from paddy field , coconut grove and plantation leaves was pleasant for eyes. We reached Kovalam as per our plan, saw sunset which was magnificient. It was great to watch perfect sunrise and sunset on a same day. Public Beach was next to Taj and Leela hotels where large part belongs to them for their private beach.
